channel.title: My discontinued Flax picker

item.title: My discontinued Flax picker
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Here is my flax picker, you may finish it up. I got banned so i couldn’t finish it. Here it is!

[scar] {
Flax Picker
Ub3r |<1||3r
Will get flax and spin them
V1
NOTE: One player support only!

 Instructions: 1. go to any bank slot.
                2. Run
                                                                                                                                                                }

{.include SRL\SRL.scar}

var
W, Tole, FlaxMS, Flaxy:integer;

const
Spin = True; //// do you want to spin them?
Flax = 15131288; /// blue color of the flax. Change if all goes wrong
Door = 2255241; /// color of the door in the spinner room
MapleMM = 2314108; ///color of maple tree on minimap
FlaxMM = 12022385; //// color of flax in Minimap
Banker = 5824503; ///color of bank symbol
TreeSymbolMM = 827679; //// color of rare tree symbol
Ladder = 735078; //// ladder color in the bank
LadderC = 2250864; //// Color of the ladder on the main screen.
PIN = 5946; //// Bank pin

procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
HowManyPlayers :=1;
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers);
CurrentPlayer:=0;

 Players[0].Name :='Username';
 Players[0].Pass :='Password';
 Players[0].Nick :='ser';
 Players[0].Active:=True;

end;

procedure Setup;
begin
Status(‘setting up’)
ActivateClient;
SetupSRL;
DeclarePlayers;
end;

function ClickNpcChatText1(txt: String): Boolean;
var
tx,ty,s:integer;
begin
s := CreateBitmapMaskFromText(txt, npcchars);
if FindBitmapMaskTolerance(s, tx, ty, 9, 348, 523, 471, 50, 10) then
begin
Mouse(tx + 5, ty + 8, 0, 0, False);
Result:=True;
end;
FreeBitmap(s);
end;

function ColorFinder (a, b, c, d, col :integer) :Tpoint;
var
y, t, u:integer;

begin
y:= 0
repeat
wait(50)
y:= + 1
Until(FindColorTolerance(t, u, col, a, b, c, d, y))
Result.X:= t
Result.Y:= u
end;

procedure Flaxer;
begin
Status(‘Moving’)
Face(‘N’)
if (Not ( FindCOlortolerance(x, y, TreeSymbolMM, 608, 115, 703, 133, 5))) then
TerminateScript;
MouseFlag(x - 6, y + 3, 5, 5)
if (Not ( Findcolortolerance(x, y, MapleMM, 598, 98, 626, 124, 5))) then
TerminateScript;
MouseFlag(x, y + 7, 1, 1)
if (Not ( Findcolortolerance(x, y, TreeSymbolMM, 579, 99, 689, 132, 5))) then
TerminateScript;
MouseFlag(x, y, 4, 4)
if (Not ( FindColortolerance(x, y, Ladder, 665, 99, 694, 131, 5))) then
TerminateScript;
MouseFlag(x + 15, y + 20, 5, 5)
Face(‘N’)
repeat
FindColortolerance(x, y, FlaxMM, 695 - w, 92 - w, 695 + w, 92 + w, 10)
w:= w + 5
Until(FindColortolerance(x, y, FlaxMM, 695 - w, 92 - w, 695 + w, 92 + w, 10) = True)
MouseFlag(x, y, 5, 5)
wait(1000)
Repeat
wait(5)
Tole:= Tole + 5
Until(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x, y, Flax, MSX1, MSY1, MSX2, MSY2, Tole) = True)
FlaxMS:= Getcolor(x, y)
Status(‘Flaxing’)
repeat
FindColorTolerance(x, y, FlaxMS, MSX1, MSY1, MSX2, MSY2, 5)
Mouse(x, y, 4, 4, True)
FindNormalRandoms;
if (FindFight = True) then
begin
SetRun(True)
RunAwayDirection(‘S’)
wait(2000 + random (1000))
RunBack;
end;
Until(InvFull = True)
end;

procedure Bank;
begin
Status(‘Going Back’)
PerfectNorth;
if (Not ( FindColorTolerance(x, y, Ladder, 585, 24, 610, 63, 10))) then
Terminatescript;
MouseFlag(x + 10, y + 20, 4, 4)
if (Not ( FindColortolerance(x, y, TreeSymbolMM,591, 24, 632, 73, 10))) then
TerminateScript;
MouseFlag(x, y, 1, 1)
if (Spin = True) then
begin
Status(‘Spinning’)
If (Not (FindColortolerance(x, y, Ladder,615, 51, 650, 94, 5))) then
TerminateScript;
MouseFlag(x + 5, y, 1, 1)
Status(‘Climbing’)
repeat
FindObj3(x, y, ‘up’, LadderC, 20)
wait(500 + random(100))
Until(FindObj3(x, y, ‘up’, LadderC, 20) = True)
Status(‘Spinning’)
Mouse(x, y, 1, 1, True)
wait(5000 + random(2000))
if (Not ( FindColorTolerance(x, y, 1205394, MSX1, MSY1, MSX2, MSY2, 20))) then
TerminateScript;
Repeat
FindObj3(x, y, ‘Spin’, 1205394, 10)
Until(FindObj3(x, y, ‘Spin’, 1205394, 10) = True)
Mouse(x, y, 1, 1, True)
ClickNpcChatText1(‘Flax’)
ClickOption(‘X’, 3)
wait(2000 + random (1000))
TypeSend(‘99’)
Flaxy := BitmapFromString(7, 6, ‘z78DA75CF410EC3300804C02FE1’ +
‘3A8BC311D6E4FF4F0A6DD3CA515524105AE6824855C34167CA6B5’ +
‘FA7EAD4E9B7DC36135B132441BBE664E7F82B47201C7B7824220E’ +
‘F6CF75EB2573A03D6EC68394F72EA9D5973475C9927B709595B73’ +
‘2A6F8CA9F8FC4C0A7C1903C014F3135C5’);
repeat
wait(100)
if (FindNormalRandoms = True) then
begin
Repeat
FindObj3(x, y, ‘Spin’, 1205394, 10)
Until(FindObj3(x, y, ‘Spin’, 1205394, 10) = True)
Mouse(x, y, 1, 1, True)
ClickNpcChatText1(‘Flax’)
ClickOption(‘X’, 3)
wait(2000 + random (1000))
TypeSend(‘99’)
end;
Until(FindItemBmpTol(Flaxy, 20) = False) or (isChatMessage(‘run out’))
FreeBitmap(Flaxy);
Repeat
wait(40)
Until(FindObj3(x, y, ‘down’, Ladder, 10))
Mouse(x, y, 1, 1, True)
wait(5000)
end;
if (Not (FindColorTolerance(x, y, MSX1, MSY1, MSX2, MSY2, 10))) then
TerminateScript;
MouseFlag(x, y, 7, 7)
if(Not (FindColortolerance(x, y, Banker, 636, 21, 703, 73, 10))) then
TerminateScript;
MouseFlag(x, y, 3, 3)
OpenBank2(PIN);
Depositall;
CloseBank;
end;

begin
Setup;
repeat
Flaxer;
Bank;
Until(False)
end.
[/scar]

It goes to the flax area, then picks, but doesnt spin… Spinning and banking is unfinished

Read full topic
